The sources for minizip are copied from: https://github.com/madler/zlib/releases/tag/v1.3.1

Additionally:
1. miniunz.c and minizip.c has been copied to fmi-library/src/ZIP/src/{fmi_miniunz.c,fmi_minizip.c}
2. The above mentioned copied files have also been altered. See the file-level comment in each file for details.
